document_data.name: Grovet
document_data.mainbody: '''Grovet''' was a young [[human]] miner living in [[Phandalin]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was in love with [[Bertice Edermath]], a [[half-elf]] woman who was his same age.
document_data.History:
Grovet was born in the {{YearlinkName|1476}}.{{AI-time}}

When he was twenty years old in the {{YearlinkName|1496}}, he ran away from Phandalin with Bertice without telling her father, [[Daran Edermath]]. Even if Daran had no idea, the fact that the two had disappeared together was something of an open secret in town. The young lovers headed south to [[Waterdeep]] along the [[High Road]], intent on starting a new life together.
